title: Predictive Adjusted Capped Estimator for Time Series Forecasting
text: Proportional Adjusted Capped Estimator: lightweight, transparent forecasting algorithm blending growth-rate signals volatility controls. PACE R package provides simple forecasting method inspired business planning logic: - Uses YoY, QoQ, Prior-Quarter growth - Applies capping rules prevent unrealistic jumps - Works directly date + numeric time series - black-box machine learning ‚Äî fully transparent PACE designed business analysts, forecasters, FP&teams want fast, explainable alternative ARIMA/ETS/Prophet short-term planning.

PACE Forecasting Algorithm ‚Äî pace_forecast
text: PACE (Predictive Adjusted Capped Estimator) time-series forecasting method blends Year--Year, Quarter--Quarter, Prior-Quarter growth rates, applies volatility capping, generates forward projections suitable business, economic, operational forecasting.

title: PACE Forecasting Algorithm ‚Äî pace_forecast
text: df data frame two columns: Time (Date) Value (numeric). periods Number future periods forecast (default = 12).

text: Visualizes PACE forecasts actual historical data. Displays Actual values (blue) vs Forecast values (red).

title: Plot PACE Forecast ‚Äî plot_pace
text: forecast_df data frame returned pace_forecast pace_forecast_seasonal containing columns Time Forecast. actual_df (optional) data frame historical Time Value columns.
